string.value: #p9105002# seems to be holding a very fascinating event. I better go check it out.
#p9105002# gave me all the information on the newest event that she planned. I should talk to her again in a bit.
#p9105002# gave me an entrance ticket to participate in the event.
Hey there! Isn't it beautiful outside?
I am #p9105002#, a special event planner/event guide. I spend most of the time cooking up new events for the public, and this is when I get to see other people enjoy my hours of hard work!
So what do you think? If you have some free time on hand, you should definitely join this event. Interested?
Awesome! Well, I need to print you a new ticket for entrance. Talk to me in a bit.
Oh, really. That's too bad. Like I said, if you have some time to burn, you should really try this.
Hey, you didn't wait too long, did you? Here is your ticket!
ï¼ˆand that's how I received #b#t4032055##k. Where am I supposed to go to use this?)
